featured.text: The 1960s and ’70s 28 the development of most modern stunt technology, like air rams and bullet squibs.

definition.zh_def: 隨機存取記憶體，一種用於計算機的短期記憶體，能快速讀取和寫入數據。
definition.en_def: Random Access Memory, a type of computer memory that can be accessed randomly and is used for temporary data storage.
definition.example: The computer runs faster when it has more RAM installed.
